title: Hukuk Bürosu
description: Modern ve profesyonel hukuk bürosu web sitesi. Güvenilir ve erişilebilir tasarım ile hukuki hizmetlerinizi dijitalde sunun. Responsive tasarım ve kullanıcı dostu arayüz.

title: Ayvalık Zeytinyağı Store
description: E-ticaret odaklı zeytinyağı satış platformu. Geleneksel lezzetleri modern teknoloji ile buluşturan, kullanıcı dostu online mağaza tasarımı.

title: Meryem Portfolio
description: Kişisel portföy ve blog sitesi. Yaratıcı profesyoneller için özel tasarlanmış, modern ve etkileyici portföy platformu.

title: Modern Design Studio
description: A sleek and modern design studio website featuring clean typography, minimalist layouts, and intuitive user experience. Perfect for creative agencies looking to showcase their portfolio with style.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: A comprehensive e-commerce solution with advanced filtering, seamless checkout process, and mobile-first responsive design. Built with modern web technologies for optimal performance.

title: Personal Blog & Portfolio
description: A beautiful personal blog and portfolio website featuring dark mode, smooth animations, and elegant typography. Perfect for writers, designers, and creative professionals.

title: Restaurant Booking App
description: An intuitive restaurant booking application with real-time availability, table management, and integrated payment system. Designed for both customers and restaurant owners.

title: Fitness Tracking Dashboard
description: A comprehensive fitness tracking dashboard with workout planning, progress visualization, and social features. Helps users stay motivated and achieve their fitness goals.

title: Travel Planning Platform
description: A beautiful travel planning platform with interactive maps, itinerary creation, and booking integration. Makes trip planning effortless and enjoyable.

title: Music Streaming Interface
description: A modern music streaming interface with personalized playlists, advanced search, and seamless cross-device synchronization. Redefines the music listening experience.

title: Educational Learning Platform
description: An innovative educational platform with interactive courses, progress tracking, and collaborative learning features. Designed to make learning engaging and effective.
